18
19#include <stdbool.h>
20
21/* Return the new CLASSPATH value. The given classpaths are prepended to
22 the current CLASSPATH value. If use_minimal_classpath, the current
23 CLASSPATH is ignored. */
24extern char * new_classpath (const char * const *classpaths,
25 unsigned int classpaths_count,
26 bool use_minimal_classpath);
27
28/* Set CLASSPATH and returns a safe copy of its old value. */
29extern char * set_classpath (const char * const *classpaths,
30 unsigned int classpaths_count,
31 bool use_minimal_classpath, bool verbose);
32
33/* Restore CLASSPATH to its previous value. */
34extern void reset_classpath (char *old_classpath);
35
